attackSkillOne.name: Time to Strike
attackSkillOne.description: Inflict damage equal to 150% of own physical attack to a single target

attackSkillTwo.name: Thorny Path
attackSkillTwo.description: Perform a slash combo that deals damage equal to 120% of Physical Attack to a single target, and restores 30% of this damage as HP.

attackSkillThree.name: Critical Motives
attackSkillThree.description: Increase your physical attack by 30% for 1 Turn

passiveOne.name: Victorious Will
passiveOne.description: Activates a field effect at the start of battle. +5% Damage each time a character from the Struggle Faction takes action. Upto 6 times (+30%).

passiveTwo.name: Hymn of Destiny
passiveTwo.description: Increase Physical Defense by 6% every time you take damage, Upto a maximum of stacks (+12%)

peakPerformance.name: Peak Performance
peakPerformance.active: Gain 1 [Rampage] each time you are attacked by an enemy.
peakPerformance.passive: Deal damage equal to 340% of own physical attack to a single target. When [Rampage] reaches 3 stacks, counterattack the attacker, then remove this effect.
